trans-unit.source: During your upkeep, each of your opponents loses 1 life. Gain 1 life for each 1 life lost this way.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段中，你的每个对手都失去1点生命。每有人因此失去1点生命，你便得到1点生命。

ULG·69 | Swat | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.resname: ULG·73 | About Face | Card Name
ULG·73 | About Face | Card Text | Paragraph 1

ULG·127 | Iron Maiden | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: During each of your opponent's upkeeps, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to that player for each card more than four in his or her hand.
trans-unit.target: 在你每个对手的维持阶段中，该玩家手牌数量若超过四张，则每多一张牌，CARDNAME便对该玩家造成1点伤害。
